item.title: CV
item.description: @tuxedocat An open-minded engineer interested in both theoretical and practical side of Natural Language Processing. Currently working as a data engineer, trying to build a pipeline which is from data collection to result delivery in not-data-friendly industrial application. Skills and proficiency Natural languages Japanese (native) English (proficient: TOEIC 935⁄990, IELTS Academic overall 7.0/9.0) German (beginner) Programming languages Python Sh Scala (beginner) Frameworks and tools Linux (RHEL6, 7x / Ubuntu) PyData stack (Numpy/Scipy/Pandas/Scikit-learn/Jupyter) Apache Spark (Cloudera CDH) Git Collaboration tools such as Redmine, GitLab Education MS, Information Science (Natural Language Processing), Nara Institute of Science and Technology Computational Linguistics Lab.
